title: When global AI rush reaches a small Andhra Pradesh village
description: Google is building a massive AI hub and data center in Tarluwada, Andhra Pradesh. This $15 billion investment is Google's largest in India. The project will bring jobs and infrastructure upgrades to the region. Visakhapatnam is set to become a major AI and co…
content: A narrow 20-foot road near Palavalasa village on the Anandapuram-Anakapalli highway winds its way down to Tarluwada, a tiny settlement so obscure that even many in Visakhapatnam city had never heard … [+7896 chars]
